title: Indigeneous Australians: an Aboriginal community focus (A)
creator_contributor_role: New South Wales. Technical and Further Education, production company
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Legal status, laws, etc.
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Aboriginal Australians - Legends
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Aboriginal Australians - Economic conditions
description: An interactive CD-ROM from TAFE which is the first to draw on the comprehensive knowledge and expertise of Aboriginal community members and is an invaluable teaching resource. The concept behind this CD-ROM is to let members of various Aboriginal Communities become teachers of their rich culture. A resource guide accompanies the CD-ROM. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: This CD-ROM is compatible on both Macintosh and IBM compatible PC's.
